alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clay and south central Duval Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, or over Orange Park, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Mandarin, Nas Jax, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside and Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
